lead_paragraph: Gap reported an 8 percent decline in its first-quarter profit, hurt by currency fluctuations and persistent sluggish sales at its Gap and Banana Republic stores.

headline.print_headline: Sluggish Sales Hurt Gap’s Bottom Line
headline.main: Sluggish Sales Hurt Gap’s Bottom Line

snippet: Gap reported an 8 percent decline in its first-quarter profit, hurt by currency fluctuations and persistent sluggish sales at its Gap and Banana Republic stores.
abstract: Gap reports earnings of $239 million in first quarter and revenue of $3.66 billion, down 3.1 percent from year earlier.
